body: Pearl Jam, Beach Boy and Pearl Jam 2 is Black Dog's best series. I just wish there was a continuation for Beach Boy with Venus, Jupiter and Uranus getting dped, and Sailor Moon getting some dap and dpp, and then a Pearl Jam 3 with the continuation of that night with Mars getting airtight and some dap and dpp too. Also with all girls breaking down and talking very slutty dirty talk to push men to do harder and harder. That would be amazing.

How this not have a cheating tag? It's the mother of the entire non-ntr cheating genre. About as bad as cheating can get without being NTR. Blackmail aswell, or would this kind of more subtle and manipulative sort of blackmailing hold another definition? Moral degeneration is also a given, basically what the story is about.
for such a manga author, a monument must be put!
